# set(RANGE_V3_HEADER_CHECKS ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
# set(RANGES_PREFER_REAL_CONCEPTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
# set(RANGES_DEEP_STL_INTEGRATION OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(RANGE_V3_HEADER_CHECKS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(RANGE_V3_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(RANGE_V3_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(RANGE_V3_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(RANGE_V3_PERF OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
add_subdirectory(range-v3)


set(SPIRV_CROSS_STATIC ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(SPIRV_CROSS_SHARED OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(SPIRV_CROSS_CLI OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(SPIRV_CROSS_EXCEPTIONS_TO_ASSERTIONS ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
add_subdirectory(SPIRV-Cross)

add_subdirectory(backward-cpp)
add_subdirectory(fmt)
